# gavir

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

This package had a hob glob, hodge podge, mix and match set of functions to use at Gavi. This hodge podge includes some helper functions to sle ggplot and flextable

## Installation

You can install the development version of gavir from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("joshualorin/gavir")
```

## Example

This is a basic example which shows you how to solve a common problem:

```{r example}
library(gavir)
## basic example code

x <- "alfa,bravo,charlie,delta"
strsplit1(x, split = ",")

```
